files.name: meth_seq_m
files.label: Sequencing-based DNA Methylation (meth_seq) - Analysis Metadata File (m)

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identifier assigned to a computational analysis run that was performed on a group of analyzed samples and any associated matched samples using a particular set of methods, tools, etc.; analysis IDs must be unique and must not be reused by a project across subsequent analysis runs

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: A unique identifier representing the particular sample that was analyzed; analyzed sample identifiers must be used consistently to relate those described in the sample file and in the related analysis files

config.description: analyzed_sample_id cannot begin with 'SA*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (analyzed_sample_id ~= '(S|s)(A|a).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: sequencing_platform
fields.label: Identifier of platform or technology used for analysis or verification; identifier should be taken from controlled vocabulary list of platforms recognized by the DCC and should directly correspond to the particular technology (including version) used. If no appropriate term exists for a given platform, please contact the DCC to request an addition to the CV terms.

fields.name: fraction_wg_cpg_sites_covered
fields.label: Fraction of whole genome CpG sites covered in the assay

fields.name: conversion_rate
fields.label: Bisulfite conversion rate of the analyzed sample in the assay

fields.name: experimental_protocol
fields.label: Name of experimental protocol and option to include URL to written protocol and/or algorithm parameters. Syntax should be: '<Name of Protocol><single whitespace><URL to protocol (optional)><single whitespace><algorithm parameters (optional)>'

fields.name: sequencing_strategy
fields.label: Sequencing technique intended for the analyzed sample library

fields.name: base_quality_score_threshold
fields.label: Filtering threshold of base quality score

fields.name: alignment_algorithm
fields.label: Name of alignment algorithm and option to include URL to written protocol and/or algorithm parameters. Syntax should be: '<Name of Protocol><single whitespace><URL to protocol (optional)><single whitespace><algorithm parameters (optional)>'

config.examples: BWA 0.6.2 http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net bwa aln -q20 HGref s1.fastq > s1_bwa.sai

fields.name: other_analysis_algorithm
fields.label: Names of other analysis algorithms. Separate multiple algorithms by commas.

fields.name: raw_data_repository
fields.label: Public repository where raw data is submitted

fields.name: raw_data_accession
fields.label: Accession for referencing the raw data at the public repository

config.description: Format of raw data accession must match the format required by the raw data repository
config.script: EGA = (raw_data_repository == '1' || raw_data_repository == 'EGA'); dbSNP = (raw_data_repository == '2' || raw_data_repository == 'dbSNP'); TCGA = (raw_data_repository == '3' || raw_data_repository == 'TCGA'); CGHub = (raw_data_repository == '4' || raw_data_repository == 'CGHub'); GEO = (raw_data_repository == '5' || raw_data_repository == 'GEO'); TARGET = (raw_data_repository == '6' || raw_data_repository == 'TARGET'); if (EGA) { raw_data_accession ~= '(?iu)EGA[DS][0-9]{11}|((?iu)EGA[S][0-9]{11})?([:])?((?iu)EGA[D][0-9]{11})?([:](?iu)EGA[N][0-9]{11})?(([:](?iu)EGA[X][0-9]{11})+)?(([:](?iu)EGA[R][0-9]{11})+)?' } else if (GEO) { raw_data_accession ~= 'G(SE|DS|SM)[0-9]+' } else if (TCGA) { raw_data_accession ~= 'TCGA-[A-Za-z0-9_-]+'} else if (CGHub) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Fa-f0-9-]+' } else if (dbSNP) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Za-z0-9_-]+.*' } else if (TARGET) { raw_data_accession ~= 'ftp://caftpd.nci.nih.gov/pub/dcc_target/[A-Za-z0-9/_.-]+'} else { return false }

fields.name: assembly_version
fields.label: Version of human reference genome assembly used in the analysis; specify the version used in alignments, or associated with the particular platform used

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identifier assigned to a computational analysis run that was performed on a single analyzed sample and any associated matched samples using a particular set of methods, tools, etc.; analysis IDs must be unique and must not be reused by a project across subsequent analysis runs. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: A unique identifier representing the particular sample that was analyzed; analyzed sample identifiers must be used consistently to relate those described in the sample file and in the related analysis files. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores

config.description: analyzed_sample_id cannot begin with 'SA*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (analyzed_sample_id ~= '(S|s)(A|a).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the mutation/variation

fields.name: chromosome_start
fields.label: Chromosome start position of the feature being described

config.description: Chromosome start position must be equal or greater than 1

fields.name: chromosome_end
fields.label: Chromosome end position of the feature being described

config.description: Chromosome end position must be less than or equal to the length of the chromosome

fields.name: chromosome_strand
fields.label: Chromosome strand of mutation. Only accept positive strand (1)

fields.name: methylation_ratio
fields.label: Values ranging from 0 (completely unmethylated) to 1 (completely methylated). Methylation_ratio = methylated_read_count / (methylated_read_count + unmethylated_read_count). Value should be number with two decimal places.

fields.name: methylated_read_count
fields.label: Count of methylated reads at the specified genomic location

fields.name: unmethylated_read_count
fields.label: Count of unmethylated reads at the specified genomic location

fields.name: verification_status
fields.label: Indicate if the detected methylation status of this location is confirmed by using an independent orthogonal genotype platform/technology

fields.name: verification_platform
fields.label: Identifier of orthogonal platform or technology used to confirm that the detected methylation status is true; identifier should be taken from controlled vocabulary list of platforms recognized by the DCC and should directly correspond to the particular technology (including version) used. If no appropriate term exists for a given platform, please contact the DCC to request an addition to the CV terms.

config.description: If mutation is verified, the verification platform must be specified (cannot be -777/-888)
config.script: if ( (verification_status == '1' || verification_status == 'tested and verified') && verification_platform == null ) { return false } else { return true }

fields.name: raw_data_accession
fields.label: Accession for referencing the raw data at the public repository

config.description: Format of raw data accession must match the format required by the raw data repository
config.script: EGA = (raw_data_repository == '1' || raw_data_repository == 'EGA'); dbSNP = (raw_data_repository == '2' || raw_data_repository == 'dbSNP'); TCGA = (raw_data_repository == '3' || raw_data_repository == 'TCGA'); CGHub = (raw_data_repository == '4' || raw_data_repository == 'CGHub'); GEO = (raw_data_repository == '5' || raw_data_repository == 'GEO'); TARGET = (raw_data_repository == '6' || raw_data_repository == 'TARGET'); if (EGA) { raw_data_accession ~= '(?iu)EGA[DS][0-9]{11}|((?iu)EGA[S][0-9]{11})?([:])?((?iu)EGA[D][0-9]{11})?([:](?iu)EGA[N][0-9]{11})?(([:](?iu)EGA[X][0-9]{11})+)?(([:](?iu)EGA[R][0-9]{11})+)?' } else if (GEO) { raw_data_accession ~= 'G(SE|DS|SM)[0-9]+' } else if (TCGA) { raw_data_accession ~= 'TCGA-[A-Za-z0-9_-]+'} else if (CGHub) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Fa-f0-9-]+' } else if (dbSNP) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Za-z0-9_-]+.*' } else if (TARGET) { raw_data_accession ~= 'ftp://caftpd.nci.nih.gov/pub/dcc_target/[A-Za-z0-9/_.-]+'} else { return false }

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identifier assigned to a computational analysis run that was performed on a single analyzed sample and any associated matched samples using a particular set of methods, tools, etc.; analysis IDs must be unique and must not be reused by a project across subsequent analysis runs. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores.

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: A unique identifier representing the particular sample that was analyzed; analyzed sample identifiers must be used consistently to relate those described in the sample file and in the related analysis files. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores.

config.description: analyzed_sample_id cannot begin with 'SA*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (analyzed_sample_id ~= '(S|s)(A|a).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: mirna_db
fields.label: The name of the miRNA database used, chosen from the DCC's codelist

fields.name: mirna_id
fields.label: The miRNA accession ID in the chosen miRNA database. Use -777 when miRNA detected does not exist in the miRNA db, i.e., a possibly novel miRNA

config.description: If the reported miRNA is in a public miRNA database (mirna_db is not null), a miRNA accession ID (mirna_id) must be specified
config.script: if (mirna_db != '-777' && mirna_db != '-888') { mirna_id != '-777' && mirna_id != '-888' } else { return false; }

fields.name: normalized_read_count
fields.label: Normalized read count for the current miRNA

fields.name: raw_read_count
fields.label: Raw read count for the current gene

fields.name: fold_change
fields.label: Gene expression fold change

fields.name: is_isomir
fields.label: A flag from a codelist that indicates if the current miRNA is an isomir, which is defined as having a variation with respect to the annotated annotated mature miRNA

fields.name: chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the miRNA. Do not fill when the detected miRNA is annotated in miRNA database

config.description: If the detected miRNA is in a public miRNA Db (ie. mirna_db is not null), the chromosome number should not be filled in (use '-888'). However if the reported miRNA is not in miRNA DB, chromosome must be filled in
config.script: if (mirna_db != '-777' && mirna_db != '-888') { chromosome != '-777' && chromosome != '-888' } else if (mirna_db == '-777' || mirna_db == '-888') { chromosome == '-777' || chromosome == '-888' } else { return false }

fields.name: chromosome_start
fields.label: Chromosome start position of the feature being described

config.description: If the detected miRNA is not in a public miRNA Db (ie. mirna_id and mirna_db are not provided), the chromosome start/end positions must be specified

fields.name: chromosome_end
fields.label: Chromosome end position of the feature being described

config.description: If the detected miRNA is not in a public miRNA Db (ie. mirna_id and mirna_db are not provided), the chromosome start/end positions must be specified. Chromosome end position must be less than or equal to the length of the chromosome

fields.name: chromosome_strand
fields.label: Chromosome strand of the feature being described.

config.description: If the detected miRNA is not in a public miRNA Db (ie. mirna_id and mirna_db are not provided), the chromosome strand needs to be specified
config.script: if ( (mirna_db == '-777' || mirna_db == '-888') && (mirna_id == '-777' || mirna_id == '-888') ) { if ((chromosome_strand == '-777') || (chromosome_strand == '-888')) { return false } else { return true } } else { return true }

fields.name: verification_status
fields.label: Indicate if the detected miRNA has been verified using an independent orthogonal genotype platform/technology

fields.name: verification_platform
fields.label: Identifier of orthogonal platform or technology used to confirm that the detected miRNA  is true; identifier should be taken from controlled vocabulary list of platforms recognized by the DCC and should directly correspond to the particular technology (including version) used. If no appropriate term exists for a given platform, please contact the DCC to request an addition to the CV terms.

config.description: If detected miRNA is verified, the verification platform must be specified (cannot be -777/-888)
config.script: if ( (verification_status == '1' || verification_status == 'tested and verified') && verification_platform == null ) { return false } else { return true }

fields.name: variant_type
fields.label: A controlled vocabulary term describing the type of the observed variant

fields.name: chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the mutation/variation without the chr prefix

fields.name: chromosome_start
fields.label: Chromosome start position of the feature being described

config.description: Chromosome start position must be less than or equal to the chromosome end position. If single-base substution or insertion, the chromosome start position must equal the chromosome end position. If variant is a deletion or multiple-base substitution, then the difference between the chromosome end and start position must be less than or equal to 200.
config.script: lengths = ['1':249250621, '2':243199373, '3':198022430, '4':191154276, '5':180915260, '6':171115067, '7':159138663, '8':146364022, '9':141213431, '10':135534747, '11':135006516, '12':133851895, '13':115169878, '14':107349540, '15':102531392, '16':90354753, '17':81195210, '18':78077248, '19':59128983, '20':63025520, '21':48129895, '22':51304566, 'X':155270560, 'Y':59373566, 'MT':16569]; mismatch = (variant_type == '1' || variant_type == 'single base substitution'); insertion = (variant_type == '2' || variant_type == 'insertion of <= 200 bp'); deletion = (variant_type == '3' || variant_type == 'deletion of <= 200 bp'); multiple_base_substitution = (variant_type == '4' || variant_type == 'multiple base substitution (>= 2bp and <= 200bp)'); if (!(chromosome_start >= 1 && chromosome_end <= lengths[chromosome] && chromosome_start <= chromosome_end)) { return false } if (mismatch || insertion) {chromosome_start == chromosome_end } else if (deletion || multiple_base_substitution) { chromosome_end - chromosome_start + 1 <= 200 } else { return false }

fields.name: chromosome_end
fields.label: Chromosome end position of the feature being described

config.description: Chromosome end position must be less than or equal to the chromosome length. If single-base substution or insertion, the chromosome start position must equal the chromosome end position. If variant is a deletion or multiple-base substitution, then the difference between the chromosome end and start position must be less than or equal to 200.
config.script: lengths = ['1':249250621, '2':243199373, '3':198022430, '4':191154276, '5':180915260, '6':171115067, '7':159138663, '8':146364022, '9':141213431, '10':135534747, '11':135006516, '12':133851895, '13':115169878, '14':107349540, '15':102531392, '16':90354753, '17':81195210, '18':78077248, '19':59128983, '20':63025520, '21':48129895, '22':51304566, 'X':155270560, 'Y':59373566, 'MT':16569]; mismatch = (variant_type == '1' || variant_type == 'single base substitution'); insertion = (variant_type == '2' || variant_type == 'insertion of <= 200 bp'); deletion = (variant_type == '3' || variant_type == 'deletion of <= 200 bp'); multiple_base_substitution = (variant_type == '4' || variant_type == 'multiple base substitution (>= 2bp and <= 200bp)'); if (!(chromosome_start >= 1 && chromosome_end <= lengths[chromosome] && chromosome_start <= chromosome_end)) { return false } if (mismatch || insertion) {chromosome_start == chromosome_end } else if (deletion || multiple_base_substitution) { chromosome_end - chromosome_start + 1 <= 200 } else { return false }

fields.name: chromosome_strand
fields.label: Chromosome strand of mutation. Must always use forward strand (1)

fields.name: reference_genome_allele
fields.label: Allele in the reference genome. For insertions, use a dash sign for a missing base. For all other types of variations, use forward strand DNA sequence at the reference genome position as specified in chromosome, chromosome_start and chromosome_end

fields.name: genotype
fields.label: Genotype of the control sample. Use a dash for each missing allele.

fields.name: variant_allele
fields.label: The allele in genotype that is different from reference_genome_allele

config.description: The allele in this field must be one of the alleles defined in genotype field. If variation is a deletion, the allele must be represented as a dash. Otherwise, for all other variations, the allele must be represented as either A,C,T or G. For a mismatch mutation, only one base must be provided. For insertions and multiple base substitutions, the length of the variant_allele must be between 1-200. If variatio is a multiple base substitution, the length of variant_allele and reference_genome_allele cannot both be 1. The allele specified in variant_allele must not be the same as the allele specified in reference_genome_allele
config.script: mismatch = (variant_type == '1' || variant_type == 'single base substitution'); insertion = (variant_type == '2' || variant_type == 'insertion of <= 200 bp'); deletion = (variant_type == '3' || variant_type == 'deletion of <= 200 bp'); multiple_base_substitution = (variant_type == '4' || variant_type == 'multiple base substitution (>= 2bp and <= 200bp)'); length_of_variant_allele = variant_allele.length(); length_of_reference_genome_allele = reference_genome_allele.length(); genotypeAlleles = genotype.split('/'); if (!(genotypeAlleles contains variant_allele)) { return false } if (deletion && (variant_allele != '-')) { return false } if ( (mismatch || insertion || multiple_base_substitution) && !(variant_allele ~='[ACTG]+') ) { return false } if (mismatch && length_of_variant_allele != 1) { return false } if ( (insertion || multiple_base_substitution) && (length_of_variant_allele < 1 || length_of_variant_allele > 200) ){ return false } if (multiple_base_substitution) { !(length_of_variant_allele == 1 && length_of_reference_genome_allele == 1) } if (variant_allele == reference_genome_allele) { return false } return true

fields.name: quality_score
fields.label: Quality score of the observation

fields.name: probability
fields.label: Probability of the observation

fields.name: total_read_count
fields.label: Total number of raw reads that cover the base(s) where the variation occurs

fields.name: variant_allele_read_count
fields.label: Total number of raw reads that contain the variant allele

config.description: The value for variant allele read count must be less than the value for total read count
config.script: if (variant_allele_read_count == null || total_read_count == null) { return true } else { variant_allele_read_count <= total_read_count }

If no appropriate term exists for a given platform, please contact the DCC to request an addition to the CV terms.

config.description: If mutation is verified, the verification platform must be specified (cannot be -777/-888)
config.script: if ( (verification_status == '1' || verification_status == 'tested and verified') && verification_platform == null ) { return false } else { return true }

config.script: EGA = (raw_data_repository == '1' || raw_data_repository == 'EGA'); dbSNP = (raw_data_repository == '2' || raw_data_repository == 'dbSNP'); TCGA = (raw_data_repository == '3' || raw_data_repository == 'TCGA'); CGHub = (raw_data_repository == '4' || raw_data_repository == 'CGHub'); GEO = (raw_data_repository == '5' || raw_data_repository == 'GEO'); TARGET = (raw_data_repository == '6' || raw_data_repository == 'TARGET'); if (EGA) { raw_data_accession ~= '(?iu)EGA[DS][0-9]{11}|((?iu)EGA[S][0-9]{11})?([:])?((?iu)EGA[D][0-9]{11})?([:](?iu)EGA[N][0-9]{11})?(([:](?iu)EGA[X][0-9]{11})+)?(([:](?iu)EGA[R][0-9]{11})+)?' } else if (GEO) { raw_data_accession ~= 'G(SE|DS|SM)[0-9]+' } else if (TCGA) { raw_data_accession ~= 'TCGA-[A-Za-z0-9_-]+'} else if (CGHub) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Fa-f0-9-]+' } else if (dbSNP) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Za-z0-9_-]+.*' } else if (TARGET) { raw_data_accession ~= 'ftp://caftpd.nci.nih.gov/pub/dcc_target/[A-Za-z0-9/_.-]+'} else { return false }

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identifier assigned to a computational analysis run that was performed on a single analyzed sample and any associated matched samples using a particular set of methods, tools, etc.; analysis IDs must be unique and must not be reused by a project across subsequent analysis runs. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores.

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: A unique identifier representing the particular sample that was analyzed; analyzed sample identifiers must be used consistently to relate those described in the sample file and in the related analysis files. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores.

config.description: analyzed_sample_id cannot begin with 'SA*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (analyzed_sample_id ~= '(S|s)(A|a).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: mutation_type
fields.label: Type of mutation

fields.name: chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the mutation/variation

fields.name: chromosome_start
fields.label: Chromosome start position of the feature being described

config.description: Chromosome start position must be less than or equal to the chromosome end position. If single-base substution or insertion, the chromosome start position must equal the chromosome end position. If mutation is a deletion or multiple-base substitution, then the difference between the chromosome end and start position must be less than or equal to 200.
config.script: lengths = ['1':249250621, '2':243199373, '3':198022430, '4':191154276, '5':180915260, '6':171115067, '7':159138663, '8':146364022, '9':141213431, '10':135534747, '11':135006516, '12':133851895, '13':115169878, '14':107349540, '15':102531392, '16':90354753, '17':81195210, '18':78077248, '19':59128983, '20':63025520, '21':48129895, '22':51304566, 'X':155270560, 'Y':59373566, 'MT':16569]; mismatch = (mutation_type == '1' || mutation_type == 'single base substitution'); insertion = (mutation_type == '2' || mutation_type == 'insertion of <=200bp'); deletion = (mutation_type == '3' || mutation_type == 'deletion of <=200bp'); multiple_base_substitution = (mutation_type == '4' || mutation_type == 'multiple base substitution (>=2bp and <=200bp)'); if (!(chromosome_start >= 1 && chromosome_end <= lengths[chromosome] && chromosome_start <= chromosome_end)) { return false } if (mismatch || insertion) {chromosome_start == chromosome_end } else if (deletion || multiple_base_substitution) { chromosome_end - chromosome_start + 1 <= 200 } else { return false }

fields.name: chromosome_end
fields.label: Chromosome end position of the feature being described

config.description: Chromosome end position must be less than or equal to the chromosome length. If single-base substution or insertion, the chromosome start position must equal the chromosome end position. If mutation is a deletion or multiple-base substitution, then the difference between the chromosome end and start position must be less than or equal to 200.
config.script: lengths = ['1':249250621, '2':243199373, '3':198022430, '4':191154276, '5':180915260, '6':171115067, '7':159138663, '8':146364022, '9':141213431, '10':135534747, '11':135006516, '12':133851895, '13':115169878, '14':107349540, '15':102531392, '16':90354753, '17':81195210, '18':78077248, '19':59128983, '20':63025520, '21':48129895, '22':51304566, 'X':155270560, 'Y':59373566, 'MT':16569]; mismatch = (mutation_type == '1' || mutation_type == 'single base substitution'); insertion = (mutation_type == '2' || mutation_type == 'insertion of <=200bp'); deletion = (mutation_type == '3' || mutation_type == 'deletion of <=200bp'); multiple_base_substitution = (mutation_type == '4' || mutation_type == 'multiple base substitution (>=2bp and <=200bp)'); if (!(chromosome_start >= 1 && chromosome_end <= lengths[chromosome] && chromosome_start <= chromosome_end)) { return false } if (mismatch || insertion) {chromosome_start == chromosome_end } else if (deletion || multiple_base_substitution) { chromosome_end - chromosome_start + 1 <= 200 } else { return false }

fields.name: chromosome_strand
fields.label: Chromosome strand of mutation. Must always use forward strand (1)

fields.name: reference_genome_allele
fields.label: Allele in the reference genome. For insertions, use a dash. For all other types of mutations, use forward strand DNA sequence at the reference genome position as specified in chromosome, chromosome_start and chromosome_end

fields.name: control_genotype
fields.label: Genotype of the control sample. Use a dash for a missing allele.

config.description: One of the alleles in control_genotype must match the allele specified in mutat/ed_from_allele
config.script: ctrlAlleles = control_genotype.split('/'); if (!(ctrlAlleles contains mutated_from_allele)) { return false } else { return true; }

fields.name: mutated_from_allele
fields.label: Allele that is believed to be the original allele in the ancestral cell that was mutated in the tumour cell. Use dash for insertions. Mutated allele must be one of the two alleles in the control_genotype

config.description: The allele in this field must be one of the alleles defined in control_genotype. If mutation is an insertion, the allele must be represented as a dash (-). Otherwise, for all other mutations, the allele must be represented as either A,C,T or G. For a mismatch mutation, only one base must be provided. For deletions and multiple base substitutions, the length of the mutated_from_allele must be between 1-200. If mutation is a multiple base substitution, the length of mutated_from_allele and mutated_to_allele cannot both be 1
config.script: mismatch = (mutation_type == '1' || mutation_type == 'single base substitution'); insertion = (mutation_type == '2' || mutation_type == 'insertion of <=200bp'); deletion = (mutation_type == '3' || mutation_type == 'deletion of <=200bp'); multiple_base_substitution = (mutation_type == '4' || mutation_type == 'multiple base substitution (>=2bp and <=200bp)'); length_of_mutated_from_allele = mutated_from_allele.length(); length_of_mutated_to_allele = mutated_to_allele.length(); ctrlAlleles = control_genotype.split('/'); if (!(ctrlAlleles contains mutated_from_allele)) {return false } if (insertion && (mutated_from_allele != '-'))  { return false } if ( (mismatch || deletion || multiple_base_substitution) && !(mutated_from_allele ~='[ACTG]+') ) { return false } if (mismatch && length_of_mutated_from_allele != 1) { return false } if ( (deletion || multiple_base_substitution) && (length_of_mutated_from_allele < 1 || length_of_mutated_from_allele > 200) ) { return false } if (multiple_base_substitution) { !(length_of_mutated_from_allele == 1 && length_of_mutated_to_allele == 1) } return true

fields.name: mutated_to_allele
fields.label: The new allele identified in the tumour sample that is believed to be the resulting allele of a somatic mutation event during tumourgenesis. Use dash for deletions. Mutant allele must be one allele and must be one of the alleles defined in tumour_genotype

config.description: The allele in this field must be one of the alleles defined in tumour_genotype. If mutation is a deletion, the allele must be represented as a dash (-). Otherwise, for all other mutations, the allele must be represented as either A,C,T or G. For a mismatch mutation, only one base must be provided. For insertions and multiple base substitutions, the length of the mutated_to_allele must be between 1-200. If mutation is a multiple base substitution, the length of mutated_from_allele and mutated_to_allele cannot both be 1
config.script: mismatch = (mutation_type == '1' || mutation_type == 'single base substitution'); insertion = (mutation_type == '2' || mutation_type == 'insertion of <=200bp'); deletion = (mutation_type == '3' || mutation_type == 'deletion of <=200bp'); multiple_base_substitution = (mutation_type == '4' || mutation_type == 'multiple base substitution (>=2bp and <=200bp)'); length_of_mutated_from_allele = mutated_from_allele.length(); length_of_mutated_to_allele = mutated_to_allele.length(); tumourAlleles = tumour_genotype.split('/'); ctrlAlleles = control_genotype.split('/'); var allele = null; if (ctrlAlleles contains mutated_to_allele) { for (allele:tumourAlleles) { if (mutated_to_allele != allele) { return false } } } else { if (!(tumourAlleles contains mutated_to_allele)) { return false } } if (deletion && (mutated_to_allele != '-')) { return false } if ( (mismatch || insertion || multiple_base_substitution) && !(mutated_to_allele ~='[ACTG]+') ) { return false } if (mismatch && length_of_mutated_to_allele != 1) { return false } if ( (insertion || multiple_base_substitution) && (length_of_mutated_to_allele < 1 || length_of_mutated_to_allele > 200) ){ return false } if (multiple_base_substitution) { !(length_of_mutated_from_allele == 1 && length_of_mutated_to_allele == 1) } return true

fields.name: tumour_genotype
fields.label: Genotype of the tumour sample. Use a dash for each missing base

config.description: Use a dash for a missing base. Must be a string consisting of two or more aleles joined by a forward slash. No whitespace allowed, and each allele must consist of either A, C, T, G or -. One of the alleles must exist in mutated_to_allele.
config.script: tumourAlleles = tumour_genotype.split('/'); (tumourAlleles contains mutated_to_allele)

fields.name: expressed_allele
fields.label: For heterozygous SNPs, the dominant allele as revealed by RNA-seq in the tumour sample. When multiple alleles are identified, up to four alleles can be specified, each separated by a comma (no whitespace allowed)

fields.name: quality_score
fields.label: Quality score of the mutation call

fields.name: probability
fields.label: Probability of the mutation call

fields.name: total_read_count
fields.label: Total number of raw reads that cover the called mutation

fields.name: mutant_allele_read_count
fields.label: Total number of raw reads that contain the mutant allele

config.description: The value for mutant allele read count must be less than the value for total read count
config.script: if (mutant_allele_read_count == null || total_read_count == null) { return true } else { mutant_allele_read_count <= total_read_count }

fields.name: verification_status
fields.label: Indicate if the mutation/variation has been verified using an independent orthogonal genotype platform/technology

fields.name: verification_platform
fields.label: Identifier of orthogonal platform or technology used to confirm that the mutation/variant is true; identifier should be taken from controlled vocabulary list of platforms recognized by the DCC and should directly correspond to the particular technology (including version) used. If no appropriate term exists for a given platform, please contact the DCC to request an addition to the CV terms.

config.description: If mutation is verified, the verification platform must be specified (cannot be -777/-888)
config.script: if ( (verification_status == '1' || verification_status == 'tested and verified') && verification_platform == null ) { return false } else { return true }

fields.name: biological_validation_status
fields.label: Indicate if the mutation/variation has been observed in a larger cohort/sample size, and is not an artifact or consequence of sample selection for sequencing

fields.name: biological_validation_platform
fields.label: Identifier of assay platform or technology used to validate the mutation/variant

config.description: If mutation is biologically validated, the biological validation platform must be specified
config.script: if (biological_validation_status == '1' || biological_validation_status == 'tested and valid') { biological_validation_platform != '-777' && biological_validation_platform != '-888' } else { return true }

config.examples: BWA 0.6.2 http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net bwa aln -q20 HGref s1.fastq > s1_bwa.sai

fields.name: variation_calling_algorithm
fields.label: Name of variation calling algorithm and option to include URL to written protocol and/or algorithm parameters. Syntax should be: '<Name of Protocol><single whitespace><URL to protocol (optional)><single whitespace><algorithm parameters (optional)>'

fields.name: other_analysis_algorithm
fields.label: Names of other analysis algorithms.  Separate multiple algorithms by commas.

fields.name: sequencing_strategy
fields.label: Sequencing technique intended for the analyzed sample library.

fields.name: seq_coverage
fields.label: Sequence coverage if analyzed by sequencing platforms

fields.name: raw_data_repository
fields.label: Public repository where raw data is submitted

fields.name: raw_data_accession
fields.label: Accession for referencing the raw data at the public repository

config.description: Format of raw data accession must match the format required by the raw data repository
config.script: EGA = (raw_data_repository == '1' || raw_data_repository == 'EGA'); dbSNP = (raw_data_repository == '2' || raw_data_repository == 'dbSNP'); TCGA = (raw_data_repository == '3' || raw_data_repository == 'TCGA'); CGHub = (raw_data_repository == '4' || raw_data_repository == 'CGHub'); GEO = (raw_data_repository == '5' || raw_data_repository == 'GEO'); TARGET = (raw_data_repository == '6' || raw_data_repository == 'TARGET'); if (EGA) { raw_data_accession ~= '(?iu)EGA[DS][0-9]{11}|((?iu)EGA[S][0-9]{11})?([:])?((?iu)EGA[D][0-9]{11})?([:](?iu)EGA[N][0-9]{11})?(([:](?iu)EGA[X][0-9]{11})+)?(([:](?iu)EGA[R][0-9]{11})+)?' } else if (GEO) { raw_data_accession ~= 'G(SE|DS|SM)[0-9]+' } else if (TCGA) { raw_data_accession ~= 'TCGA-[A-Za-z0-9_-]+'} else if (CGHub) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Fa-f0-9-]+' } else if (dbSNP) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Za-z0-9_-]+.*' } else if (TARGET) { raw_data_accession ~= 'ftp://caftpd.nci.nih.gov/pub/dcc_target/[A-Za-z0-9/_.-]+'} else { return false }

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

config.description: donor_id cannot begin with 'DO*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (donor_id ~= '(D|d)(O|o).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: specimen_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for a collected specimen assigned by data provider.

config.description: specimen_id cannot begin with 'SP*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (specimen_id ~= '(S|s)(P|p).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: biomarker_name
fields.label: Biomarker name

fields.name: biomarker_threshold
fields.label: Threshold value for the biomarker for calling a result positive. Please include units.

fields.name: biomarker_positive
fields.label: Whether test is positive for named biomarker

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

config.description: donor_id cannot begin with 'DO*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (donor_id ~= '(D|d)(O|o).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: donor_sex
fields.label: Donor biological sex. 'Other' has been removed from the controlled vocabulary due to identifiability concerns.

fields.name: donor_region_of_residence
fields.label: Country, and optionally state or province code, but not city.

fields.name: donor_vital_status
fields.label: Donor's last known vital status

fields.name: disease_status_last_followup
fields.label: Donor's last known disease status.

fields.name: donor_relapse_type
fields.label: Type of relapse or progression (for liquid tumours), if applicable

fields.name: donor_age_at_diagnosis
fields.label: Age at primary diagnosis in years.

config.description: The donor's age at diagnosis must be expressed in years. If donor is older than 90 years, submit value of 90. The donor's age at diagnosis should be less than or equal to the donor's age at enrollment
config.script: if (donor_age_at_diagnosis > 90) { return false } if (donor_age_at_diagnosis > donor_age_at_enrollment) { return false } return true

fields.name: donor_age_at_enrollment
fields.label: Age (in years) at which first specimen was collected.

config.description: The donor's age at enrollment must be expressed in years. If donor is older than 90 years old, submit value of 90. The donor age at enrollment should be greater than or equal to the donor's age at last followup
config.script: if (donor_age_at_enrollment > 90) { return false } if (donor_age_at_enrollment > donor_age_at_last_followup) { return false} return true

fields.name: donor_age_at_last_followup
fields.label: Age (in years) at last followup

fields.name: donor_relapse_interval
fields.label: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary therapy, and then relapse or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred afterwards, then donor_relapse_interval is the length of disease free interval, in days.

config.description: If donor_vital_status is alive and disease_status_last_followup is relapse or progression, the donor_relapse_interval should be less than or equal to the donor interval of last followup. If the donor is deceased and disease_status_last_followup is relapse or progression, the donor_relapse_interval should be less than or equal to the donor_survival_time. Please see Donor clinical data documentation for more details

fields.name: donor_diagnosis_icd10
fields.label: ICD-10 diagnostic code

fields.name: donor_tumour_staging_system_at_diagnosis
fields.label: Clinical staging system used at time of diagnosis, if determined. Note that this is supplementary to specimen's pathological staging.

fields.label: This is the clinical tumour stage classification made at the time of primary diagnosis, typically before any treatment. Please indicate stage at diagnosis using indicated staging system. Note that this is supplementary to specimen's pathological staging.

fields.name: donor_tumour_stage_at_diagnosis_supplemental
fields.label: Optional additional staging provided as a comma-delimited list of 'staging system:stage'

fields.name: donor_survival_time
fields.label: How long has the donor survived since primary diagnosis, in days. If source data was collected in months, use a multiplier value of '30.44' to convert values to days when preparing your submission.

config.description: Donor survival time must be submitted if donor_vital_status is deceased. If donor is alive, donor_survival_time should be equal to the donor_interval_of_last_followup. Please see Donor clinical data documentation for more details
config.script: excludeDonorList=['ICGC_0327','ICGC_0328','ICGC_0329','ICGC_0165','PCSI_0060','PCSI_0090','PCSI_0100','PCSI_0112','PCSI_0114','PCSI_0139']; alive = (donor_vital_status == '1' || donor_vital_status == 'alive'); deceased = (donor_vital_status == '2' || donor_vital_status == 'deceased'); if (!(excludeDonorList contains donor_id)) { if (deceased) { if (donor_survival_time == null) { return false } } if (alive) { if (donor_survival_time != null && donor_interval_of_last_followup != null) { if (!(donor_survival_time == donor_interval_of_last_followup)) { return false } } } return true } return true

fields.label: Interval from the primary diagnosis date to the last followup date. ICGC requests that patients be followed up every 6 months while alive.

config.description: If donor's disease_status_last_followup is progression or relapse, donor_interval_of_last_followup is required. Please see Donor clinical data documentation for more details

fields.name: donor_notes
fields.label: Free text notes concerning donor

fields.name: prior_malignancy
fields.label: Prior malignancy affecting patient.

fields.name: cancer_type_prior_malignancy
fields.label: ICD-10 diagnostic code for type of cancer in a prior malignancy.

fields.name: cancer_history_first_degree_relative
fields.label: Does patient have a first degree relative that has a history of cancer? If yes, please provide clincial informration about relative's cancer history in Donor Family file

fields.name: donor_primary_treatment_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and primary treatment, in days

config.description: The donor's primary treatment interval must be less than or equal to the donor's survival time. If donor's disease_status_last_followup is progression or relapse and the donor is alive, the combination of the donor's primary treatment interval and relapse interval should be less than or equal to the donor's interval of last followup. However, if the donor is deceased and had progressed or relapsed, the combination of the donor's primary treatment interval and relapse interval should be less than or equal to the donor's survival time. Please see Donor clinical data documentation for more details
config.script: excludeDonorList=[]; alive = (donor_vital_status == '1' || donor_vital_status == 'alive'); deceased = (donor_vital_status == '2' || donor_vital_status == 'deceased'); progression = (disease_status_last_followup == '3' || disease_status_last_followup == 'progression'); relapse = (disease_status_last_followup == '4' || disease_status_last_followup == 'relapse'); if (!(excludeDonorList contains donor_id)) { if (donor_primary_treatment_interval != null) { if (donor_survival_time != null && !(donor_primary_treatment_interval <= donor_survival_time)) { return false } if ( (progression || relapse) && donor_relapse_interval != null ) { if (alive && !(donor_primary_treatment_interval + donor_relapse_interval <= donor_interval_of_last_followup)) { return false } if (deceased && !(donor_primary_treatment_interval + donor_relapse_interval <= donor_survival_time)) { return false } } } } return true

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

config.description: donor_id cannot begin with 'DO*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (donor_id ~= '(D|d)(O|o).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: exposure_type
fields.label: Type of exposure. This field can be used if donor was exposed to something other than tobacco or alcohol.

fields.name: exposure_intensity
fields.label: Extent of the exposure. Use this field to specify intensity of exposure submitted in 'exposure_type' field

fields.name: exposure_notes
fields.label: Free text notes.

fields.name: tobacco_smoking_history_indicator
fields.label: Donor's smoking history

fields.name: tobacco_smoking_intensity
fields.label: Smoking intensity in Pack Years: Number of pack years defined as the number of cigarettes smoked per day times (x) the number of years smoked divided (/) by 20. If patient has no tobacco smoking history (ie. tobacco_smoking_history_indicator is either '1' (non-smoker) or '6' (not documented), enter '-888' (not applicable) in this field.

fields.name: alcohol_history
fields.label: A response to a question that asks whether the patient has consumed at least 12 drinks of any alcoholic beverage in their lifetime.

fields.name: alcohol_history_intensity
fields.label: Alcohol exposure intensity. If patient does not have alcohol history (ie. alcohol_history field is either '2'(no) or '3'(do not know), enter '-888' (not applicable) in this field.

config.description: This field is required if alcohol_history was specified as '1' (yes). If patient has no alcohol history (non-drinker), indicate value '1' (none) for this field. If alcohol history has not been documented, indicate '6' for this field.
config.script: alcohol_history_intensities = ['2', 'Social Drinker (> once a month, < once a week)', '3', 'Weekly Drinker (>=1x a week)', '4', 'Daily Drinker', '5', 'Occassional Drinker (< once a month)', '6', 'Not Documented']; if (alcohol_history == '1' || alcohol_history == 'yes') { alcohol_history_intensities contains alcohol_history_intensity } else if (alcohol_history == '2' || alcohol_history == 'no') { alcohol_history_intensity == '1' || alcohol_history_intensity == 'None'} else if (alcohol_history == '3' || alcohol_history == 'Don\'t know/Not sure') { alcohol_history_intensity == '6' || alcohol_history_intensity == 'Not Documented' } else { return false }

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

config.description: donor_id cannot begin with 'DO*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (donor_id ~= '(D|d)(O|o).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: donor_has_relative_with_cancer_history
fields.label: Does patient have any relatives with a history of cancer?

fields.name: relationship_type
fields.label: Relationship to the donor

config.description: If there is a history of cancer in a relative, this field must be specified.
config.script: if (donor_has_relative_with_cancer_history == '1' || donor_has_relative_with_cancer_history == 'yes') { relationship_type != null } else { return true; }

fields.name: relationship_type_other
fields.label: If 'other' answered in relationship_type field, specify the relationship type here

config.description: If 'other' answered in relationship_type field, specifiy the relationship type here
config.script: if (relationship_type == '6' || relationship_type == 'other') { relationship_type_other !=  null } else { return true; }

fields.name: relationship_sex
fields.label: Biological sex of related individual

config.description: Indicate sex of family member specified in the the 'relationship_type' field. If no family history of cancer, then -888 (not applicable) can be used in this field.
config.script: relationship_types = ['1', 'sibling', '2', 'parent', '3', 'grandparent', '4', 'uncle/aunt', '5', 'cousin', '6', 'other']; if (relationship_types contains relationship_type) { relationship_sex != null } else { return true }

fields.name: relationship_age
fields.label: Age of relative at primary diagnosis (in years)

fields.name: relationship_disease_icd10
fields.label: ICD-10 code of disease affecting family member specified in the 'relationship_type' field

fields.name: relationship_disease
fields.label: Disease name

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identifier assigned to a computational analysis run that was performed on a single analyzed sample and any associated matched samples using a particular set of methods, tools, etc.; analysis IDs must be unique and must not be reused by a project across subsequent analysis runs. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores.

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: A unique identifier representing the particular sample that was analyzed; analyzed sample identifiers must be used consistently to relate those described in the sample file and in the related analysis files

config.description: analyzed_sample_id cannot begin with 'SA*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (analyzed_sample_id ~= '(S|s)(A|a).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: junction_id
fields.label: For known exons, use exonID1_exonID2 where exonID1 and exonID2 are Ensembl IDs of the 5' and 3' exons, respectively.  For novel or putative exons, use assemblyBuild_exon1chr_exon1end_exon2chr_exon2start where assemblyBuild is hg19; exon1chr and exone2chr are the chromosomes of the 5' and 3' exons, respectively; exon1end is the end position of the 5'exon; exon2start is the start position of the 3'exon.

fields.name: gene_stable_id
fields.label: For providing Ensembl gene or transcript annotation use the DB Xref syntax: 'Ensembl:ENSGxxx'

fields.name: gene_chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the above gene.

fields.name: gene_strand
fields.label: Strand of the chromosome

fields.name: gene_start
fields.label: Start position of the entire gene on the chromosome as annotated in Ensembl

config.description: Chromosome start position must be equal or greater than 1

fields.name: gene_end
fields.label: End position of the entire gene on the chromosome as annotated in Ensembl

config.description: Chromosome end position must be less than or equal to the length of the chromosome

fields.name: second_gene_stable_id
fields.label: In the case of a fusion gene, provide the Stable ID of the gene containing the 3' exon at the junction.  For annotated genes, use Ensembl gene ID.  For putative and novel genes, use assemblyBuild_chr_start_end where assemblyBuild is hg19.

fields.name: exon1_chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the 5' exon (#)

fields.name: exon1_number_bases
fields.label: Number of bases from 5' exon

fields.name: exon1_end
fields.label: End position of the 5' exon on the chromosome

fields.name: exon1_strand
fields.label: Chromsome strand of the 5' exon

fields.name: exon2_chromosome
fields.label: Name of the chromosome containing the 3' exon (#)

fields.name: exon2_number_bases
fields.label: Number of bases from 3' exon

fields.name: exon2_start
fields.label: Start position of the 3' exon on the chromosome

fields.name: exon2_strand
fields.label: Chromosome strand of the 3' exon

fields.name: is_fusion_gene
fields.label: Indicate if the function is the result of a fusion gene

fields.name: is_novel_splice_form
fields.label: Indicate if the splice form is novel

fields.name: junction_seq
fields.label: Provide junction sequence if either is_fusion_gene or is_novel_splice_form is true

fields.name: junction_type
fields.label: Type of junction

fields.name: junction_read_count
fields.label: Count of sequencing reads that span across exons

fields.name: quality_score
fields.label: Quality score of the observation

fields.name: probability
fields.label: Probability of the observation

fields.name: verification_status
fields.label: Indicate if the mutation/variation has been verified using an independent orthogonal genotype platform/technology

fields.name: verification_platform
fields.label: Identifier of orthogonal platform or technology used to confirm that the mutation/variant is true; identifier should be taken from controlled vocabulary list of platforms recognized by the DCC and should directly correspond to the particular technology (including version) used. If no appropriate term exists for a given platform, please contact the DCC to request an addition to the CV terms.

config.description: If mutation is verified, the verification platform must be specified (cannot be -777/-888)
config.script: if ( (verification_status == '1' || verification_status == 'tested and verified') && verification_platform == null ) { return false } else { return true }

fields.name: biological_validation_status
fields.label: Indicate if the mutation/variation has been observed in a larger cohort/sample size, and is not an artifact or consequence of sample selection for sequencing

fields.name: biological_validation_platform
fields.label: Identifier of assay platform or technology used to validate the mutation/variant

config.description: If mutation is biologically validated, the biological validation platform must be specified
config.script: if (biological_validation_status == '1' || biological_validation_status == 'tested and valid') { biological_validation_platform != '-777' && biological_validation_platform != '-888' } else { return true }

fields.name: analysis_id
fields.label: Unique identifier assigned to a computational analysis run that was performed on a single analyzed sample and any associated matched samples using a particular set of methods, tools, etc.; analysis IDs must be unique and must not be reused by a project across subsequent analysis runs. Cannot contain whitespace, semi-colons or special characters. Can contain alphanumeric characters, dashes or underscores.

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: A unique identifier representing the particular sample that was analyzed; analyzed sample identifiers must be used consistently to relate those described in the sample file and in the related analysis files

config.description: analyzed_sample_id cannot begin with 'SA*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (analyzed_sample_id ~= '(S|s)(A|a).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: assembly_version
fields.label: Version of human reference genome assembly used in the analysis; specify the version used in alignments, or associated with the particular platform used

fields.name: gene_build_version
fields.label: Gene build version associated with the platform, tools or other methods used in the analysis; Supports the following syntax: 'DB:VERSION'

fields.name: platform
fields.label: Identifier of platform or technology used for analysis or verification; identifier should be taken from controlled vocabulary list of platforms recognized by the DCC and should directly correspond to the particular technology (including version) used. If no appropriate term exists for a given platform, please contact the DCC to request an addition to the CV terms.

fields.name: experimental_protocol
fields.label: Name of experimental protocol and option to include URL to written protocol and/or algorithm parameters. Syntax should be: '<Name of Protocol><single whitespace><URL to protocol (optional)><single whitespace><algorithm parameters (optional)>'

fields.name: base_calling_algorithm
fields.label: Name of base calling algorithm and option to include URL to written protocol and/or algorithm parameters. Syntax should be: '<Name of Protocol><single whitespace><URL to protocol (optional)><single whitespace><algorithm parameters (optional)>'

fields.name: alignment_algorithm
fields.label: Name of alignment algorithm and option to include URL to written protocol and/or algorithm parameters. Syntax should be: '<Name of Protocol><single whitespace><URL to protocol (optional)><single whitespace><algorithm parameters (optional)>'

config.examples: BWA 0.6.2 http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net bwa aln -q20 HGref s1.fastq > s1_bwa.sai

fields.name: normalization_algorithm
fields.label: Name of normalization algorithm and option to include URL to written protocol and/or algorithm parameters. Syntax should be: '<Name of Protocol><single whitespace><URL to protocol (optional)><single whitespace><algorithm parameters (optional)>'

fields.name: other_analysis_algorithm
fields.label: Names of other analysis algorithms.  Separate multiple algorithms by commas.

fields.name: sequencing_strategy
fields.label: Sequencing technique intended for the analyzed sample library.

fields.name: seq_coverage
fields.label: Sequence coverage if analyzed by sequencing platforms

fields.name: raw_data_repository
fields.label: Public repository where raw data is submitted

fields.name: raw_data_accession
fields.label: Accession for referencing the raw data at the public repository

config.description: Format of raw data accession must match the format required by the raw data repository
config.script: EGA = (raw_data_repository == '1' || raw_data_repository == 'EGA'); dbSNP = (raw_data_repository == '2' || raw_data_repository == 'dbSNP'); TCGA = (raw_data_repository == '3' || raw_data_repository == 'TCGA'); CGHub = (raw_data_repository == '4' || raw_data_repository == 'CGHub'); GEO = (raw_data_repository == '5' || raw_data_repository == 'GEO'); TARGET = (raw_data_repository == '6' || raw_data_repository == 'TARGET'); if (EGA) { raw_data_accession ~= '(?iu)EGA[DS][0-9]{11}|((?iu)EGA[S][0-9]{11})?([:])?((?iu)EGA[D][0-9]{11})?([:](?iu)EGA[N][0-9]{11})?(([:](?iu)EGA[X][0-9]{11})+)?(([:](?iu)EGA[R][0-9]{11})+)?' } else if (GEO) { raw_data_accession ~= 'G(SE|DS|SM)[0-9]+' } else if (TCGA) { raw_data_accession ~= 'TCGA-[A-Za-z0-9_-]+'} else if (CGHub) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Fa-f0-9-]+' } else if (dbSNP) { raw_data_accession ~= '[A-Za-z0-9_-]+.*' } else if (TARGET) { raw_data_accession ~= 'ftp://caftpd.nci.nih.gov/pub/dcc_target/[A-Za-z0-9/_.-]+'} else { return false }

fields.name: analyzed_sample_id
fields.label: A unique identifier representing the particular sample that was analyzed; analyzed sample identifiers must be used consistently to relate those described in the sample file and in the related analysis files

config.description: analyzed_sample_id cannot begin with 'SA*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (analyzed_sample_id ~= '(S|s)(A|a).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: specimen_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for a collected specimen assigned by data provider.

config.description: specimen_id cannot begin with 'SP*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (specimen_id ~= '(S|s)(P|p).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: analyzed_sample_interval
fields.label: Interval from specimen acquisition to sample use in an analytic procedure (e.g. DNA extraction), in days

fields.name: percentage_cellularity
fields.label: The cellularity (ratio of tumour nuclei to total number of nuclei in a given sample) of the analyzed sample assessed by methods other than the pathologist's report (ie. cellularity derived from sequencing data). Can populate information in either this field or level_of_cellularity

fields.name: level_of_cellularity
fields.label: The cellularity (proportion of tumour nuclei to total number of nuclei in a given sample) of the analyzed sample assessed by methods other than the pathologist's report (ie. cellularity derived from sequencing data). If exact percentage cellularity cannot be determined, submitter has option to use this field to specify a level that defines a range of percentages

fields.name: analyzed_sample_notes
fields.label: Freetext notes about sample allowed

fields.name: study
fields.label: Indicate if sample is part of a study

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

config.description: donor_id cannot begin with 'DO*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (donor_id ~= '(D|d)(O|o).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: specimen_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for a collected specimen assigned by data provider.

config.description: specimen_id cannot begin with 'SP*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (specimen_id ~= '(S|s)(P|p).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: specimen_type
fields.label: Controlled vocabulary description of specimen type.

fields.name: specimen_type_other
fields.label: Free text description of site of specimen if 108 ('Normal - other') or 113 ('Primary tumour - other') or 117 ('Recurrent tumour - other') was specified in specimen_type field.

config.description: If specimen_type is specified as either Normal - other, Primary tumour - other or Recurrent tumour - other, specimen_type_other needs to be filled in
config.script: other_specimen_types = ['108', 'Normal - other', '113', 'Primary tumour - other', '117', 'Recurrent tumour - other', '127', 'Metastatic tumour - other']; if (other_specimen_types contains specimen_type) { (specimen_type_other != null) } else { return true; }

fields.name: specimen_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and specimen acquisition, in days

fields.name: specimen_donor_treatment_type
fields.label: Type of treatment the donor received prior to specimen acquisition.

fields.name: specimen_donor_treatment_type_other
fields.label: If 'other' therapy indicated in previous column, describe it here. eg: molecular

config.description: If 'other therapy' specified in specimen_donor_treatment_type', specify the other therapy here
config.script: if (specimen_donor_treatment_type == '8' || specimen_donor_treatment_type == 'other therapy') { specimen_donor_treatment_type_other != null } else { return true; }

fields.name: specimen_processing
fields.label: Description of technique used to process specimen

fields.name: specimen_processing_other
fields.label: If 'other' specified for specimen_processing, may indicate technique here.

fields.name: specimen_storage
fields.label: Description of how specimen was stored. For specimens that were extracted freshly or immediately cultured, answer (1) 'NA'.

fields.name: specimen_storage_other
fields.label: If 'other' specified for specimen_storage, may indicate technique here.

fields.name: tumour_confirmed
fields.label: Whether tumour was confirmed in the specimen as malignant by histological examination.

fields.name: specimen_biobank
fields.label: If the specimen was obtained from a biobank, provide the biobank name here

fields.name: specimen_biobank_id
fields.label: If the specimen was obtained from a biobank, provide the biobank accession number here.

fields.name: specimen_available
fields.label: Whether additional tissue is available for followup studies.

fields.name: tumour_histological_type
fields.label: 'WHO International Histological Classification of Tumours' code. See http://w2.iarc.fr/en/publications/pdfs-online/pat-gen/bb2/BB2.pdf for details.

fields.name: tumour_grading_system
fields.label: Name of tumour grading system

fields.name: tumour_grade
fields.label: Tumour grade using indicated grading system

fields.name: tumour_grade_supplemental
fields.label: Optional additional grading provided as a comma-delimited list of 'grading system:grade'

fields.name: tumour_stage_system
fields.label: Name of tumour staging system used

fields.name: tumour_stage
fields.label: This is the pathological tumour stage classification made after the tumour has been surgically removed, and is based on the pathological results of the tumour and other tissues removed during surgery or biopsy. This information is not expected to be the same as 'donor_tumour_stage_at_diagnosis' since the pathological tumour staging information is the combination of the clinical staging information and additional information obtained during surgery. For this field, please indicate pathological tumour stage value using indicated staging system

fields.name: tumour_stage_supplemental
fields.label: Optional additional staging provided as a comma-delimited list of 'staging system:stage'

fields.name: digital_image_of_stained_section
fields.label: Linkout(s) to digital image of a stained section, demonstrating a representative section of tumour

fields.name: percentage_cellularity
fields.label: The ratio of tumour nuclei to total number of nuclei in a given specimen expressed as a percentage. Can populate information in either this field or level_of_cellularity

fields.name: level_of_cellularity
fields.label: The proportion of tumour nuclei to total number of nuclei in a given specimen. If exact percentage cellularity cannot be determined submitter has option to use this field to specify a level that defines a range of percentage.

fields.name: specimen_notes
fields.label: Free text notes allowed

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

config.description: donor_id cannot begin with 'DO*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (donor_id ~= '(D|d)(O|o).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: procedure_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and procedure, in days

fields.name: procedure_type
fields.label: Controlled vocabulary description of the procedure type. Vocabulary can be extended by disease-specific projects. Prefix extensions with 3-digit center code, e.g. 008.1 Beijing Cancer Hospital, fine needle aspiration of primary

fields.name: procedure_site
fields.label: Anatomical site of the procedure. This must use a standard controlled vocabulary which should be reported in advance to the DCC.

fields.name: resection_status
fields.label: For resection procedures, an indication of the extent of residual disease.

fields.name: specimen_id
fields.label: ID of ICGC specimen resulting from procedure. If present, must match specimen_id in specimen data file.

config.description: specimen_id cannot begin with 'SP*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (specimen_id ~= '(S|s)(P|p).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: donor_id
fields.label: Unique identifier for the donor; assigned by data provider. It must be coded, and correspond to a donor ID listed in the donor data file.

config.description: donor_id cannot begin with 'DO*'. This prefix is reserved for ICGC IDs
config.script: if (donor_id ~= '(D|d)(O|o).*') { return false } return true

fields.name: first_therapy_start_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and initiation of the first postresection therapy, in days

fields.name: first_therapy_duration
fields.label: Duration of first postresection therapy, in days

fields.name: first_therapy_type
fields.label: Type of first postresection therapy

fields.name: first_therapy_response
fields.label: What was the clinical effect of the first postresection therapy?

config.description: Use this field to describe the clinical effect of the type of therapy described in 'first_therapy_type'
config.script: therapy_types = ['2', 'chemotherapy', '3', 'radiation therapy', '4', 'combined chemo+radiation therapy', '5', 'immunotherapy', '6', 'combined chemo+immunotherapy', '7', 'surgery', '9', 'bone marrow transplant', '10', 'stem cell transplant', '11', 'monoclonal antibodies (for liquid tumours)']; if (therapy_types contains first_therapy_type) { first_therapy_response != null } else { return true }

fields.name: first_therapy_therapeutic_intent
fields.label: The therapeutic intent of the first post resection therapy

config.description: Use this field to describe the therapeutic intent of the type of therapy described in 'first_therapy_type'
config.script: therapy_types = ['2', 'chemotherapy', '3', 'radiation therapy', '4', 'combined chemo+radiation therapy', '5', 'immunotherapy', '6', 'combined chemo+immunotherapy', '7', 'surgery', '9', 'bone marrow transplant', '10', 'stem cell transplant', '11', 'monoclonal antibodies (for liquid tumours)']; if (therapy_types contains first_therapy_type) { first_therapy_therapeutic_intent != '1' && first_therapy_therapeutic_intent != 'not applicable' } else { return true }

fields.name: second_therapy_start_interval
fields.label: Interval between primary diagnosis and initiation of the second postresection therapy, in days

fields.name: second_therapy_duration
fields.label: Duration of second postresection therapy, in days

fields.name: second_therapy_type
fields.label: Type of second postresection therapy

fields.name: second_therapy_response
fields.label: What was the clinical effect of the second postresection therapy?

config.description: Use this field to describe the clinical effect of the type of therapy described in 'second_therapy_type'
config.script: therapy_types = ['2', 'chemotherapy', '3', 'radiation therapy', '4', 'combined chemo+radiation therapy', '5', 'immunotherapy', '6', 'combined chemo+immunotherapy', '7', 'surgery', '9', 'bone marrow transplant', '10', 'stem cell transplant', '11', 'monoclonal antibodies (for liquid tumours)']; if (therapy_types contains second_therapy_type) { second_therapy_response != null } else { return true }

fields.name: second_therapy_therapeutic_intent
fields.label: The therapeutic intent of the second postresection therapy

config.description: Use this field to describe the therapeutic intent of the type of therapy described in 'second_therapy_type'
config.script: therapy_types = ['2', 'chemotherapy', '3', 'radiation therapy', '4', 'combined chemo+radiation therapy', '5', 'immunotherapy', '6', 'combined chemo+immunotherapy', '7', 'surgery', '9', 'bone marrow transplant', '10', 'stem cell transplant', '11', 'monoclonal antibodies (for liquid tumours)']; if (therapy_types contains second_therapy_type) { second_therapy_therapeutic_intent != '1' && second_therapy_therapeutic_intent != 'not applicable' } else { return true }

fields.name: other_therapy
fields.label: Other postresection therapy

config.description: Use this field to describe other therapies if either 'first_therapy_type' or 'second_therapy_type' are specified as 'other therapy'
config.script: if (first_therapy_type == '8' || first_therapy_type == 'other therapy' || second_therapy_type == '8' || second_therapy_type == 'other therapy') { other_therapy != null } else { return true }

fields.name: other_therapy_response
fields.label: What is the clinical effect of the postresection therapy

config.description: Use this field to describe the response to the other therapy described in 'other_therapy'
config.script: if (other_therapy != null) { other_therapy_response != null } else { return true }

fields.name: therapy_notes
fields.label: Further description of therapy, such as dosing schedule.
